column1: Local Foods////Okay--the taste of the smoked salmon was a winner. I knew I was already ordering that based off of someone else's review. So that was a good bet. And then the soup was SO good. I've never had butternut squash soup and have always been too chicken to make it myself
column2: but now that I know it tastes like THAT
column3: I'm emboldened. My friend's beer salad was good but had him on the toilet all night and the potato salad recipe should be redone. It was like cold sweet potatoes and corn. Hm.
